name: E2open Parent Holdings, Inc.
description: E2open Parent Holdings, Inc. is a leading provider of cloud-based supply chain management solutions, dedicated to helping businesses optimize their supply chains through real-time visibility and collaboration. Founded in 2000, E2open has evolved to meet the growing demands of a globalized economy by offering a comprehensive suite of applications that span supply chain planning, execution, and collaboration. The company's platform integrates data from various sources to provide actionable insights, enabling organizations to respond swiftly to market changes and demand fluctuations. With a focus on enhancing operational efficiency, E2open serves a diverse range of industries, including manufacturing, consumer goods, automotive, high-tech, and healthcare. Their advanced analytics and machine learning capabilities empower clients to make informed decisions, reduce costs, and improve customer satisfaction. E2open's mission is to transform the way businesses manage their supply chains, fostering an ecosystem of collaboration among partners, suppliers, and customers to drive sustainable growth and innovation.

seo.meta_title: E2open Parent Holdings, Inc. | Cloud-Based Supply Chain Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore E2open, the leader in cloud-based supply chain management solutions. Learn how E2open's platform enhances collaboration, visibility, and efficiency for businesses.

faq.question: What does E2open do?
faq.answer: E2open provides cloud-based supply chain management solutions to help businesses optimize their operations through real-time visibility and collaboration.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of E2open?
faq.answer: Michael Farlekas is the CEO of E2open Parent Holdings, Inc.

faq.question: Where is E2open headquartered?
faq.answer: E2open is headquartered in Austin, Texas, USA.

faq.question: What industries does E2open serve?
faq.answer: E2open serves various industries including manufacturing, consumer goods, automotive, high-tech, and healthcare.
